page.title: 10CHANGES IN SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: a) What were the houses like in those days we asked Mrs. Smith? Similar, the windows were smaller to keep the warmth in.Many houses had outside toilets.Some had no bathroom. In the kitchen they had a big fire with a cupboard stocked with coal which was used for cooking and heating but the fire was generally kept alight all year round.They had coppers to boil things in.For clothes there was a big mangel,it was a huge thing and you had to turn a great big handle which turned two big rillers. b)What kind of clothes did you wear? when I was a little girl thing had just changed just before my time it was more modern when I was a little girl we wore white pinafores over dresses like starched ones and generally had boots on our feet.
